title: The Lazarus Protocol
premise: A brilliant, disgraced surgeon discovers that the experimental gene therapy she pioneered—and which ruined her career—is being used not to heal, but to enact a terrifying form of bioweaponized revenge. To stop the conspirators, she must infiltrate the very pharmaceutical empire that framed her, using her unique knowledge to turn their science against them before a targeted pandemic is unleashed on an unsuspecting city.
protagonist: Dr. Elara Vance, a pioneering geneticist and former star surgeon, now working in a free clinic, haunted by the death of a patient that was used to destroy her reputation.
conflict: Elara must race against time to expose and dismantle a conspiracy using her medical breakthrough to selectively kill, while evading the powerful forces that want her dead and grappling with the moral weight of having created the tool for vengeance in the first place.
setting: Present-day, in the gleaming biotech corridors of Boston's Longwood Medical Area and the shadowy, high-security labs of a monolithic pharmaceutical conglomerate.
tone: High-stakes, claustrophobic, and intellectually relentless, blending cutting-edge science with the visceral panic of a ticking-clock pandemic thriller.
